head.b:template-skin:
<!-- CSS code to style Layout options ---!>


body#layout(
width:900px;
margin:0;
padding:10px;
position:relative;
}
body#layout .add_widget
position:raltive;
border:0;
padding:10px;
border_radius:15px;
background-color:#f1f1f1;
}
body#layout .add_widget a{
font-size:15px;
cursor:pointer;
}
body#layout .add_widget a {
  color: #2196F3;
  display: block;
  font-size: 16px;
  line-height: 24px;
  margin-left: 40px;
  cursor: pointer;
  text-decoration: none;
width:100%
}
body#layout .layout-widget-description, body#layout #search-box{
display:none;
}
body#layout div.section{
padding:17px!important;
margin:0 5px 10px!important;
border:5px solid #fff;
}
body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap2{
background-color:#597ea5;
}
body#layout .draggable-widget .widget-wrap3{
background-color:#fff;
}
body#layout div.layout-title{
font-size:13px;
padding-top:7px;
}
body#layout .section h4{
font-size:14px;
margin:0;
}

body#layout #header-section {
  display: block;
}


body#layout .post-wrapper {
  display: flex;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
}
body#layout .posts-warps {
  width: 75%;
}
body#layout .sidebar {
  width: 23%;
}
body#layout .footer{
clear:both;
display:flex;
grid-gap:10px;
}
body#layout #header {
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
body#layout .top {
  height: auto;
  overflow: hidden;
  width: 100%;
}
body#layout .header-top {
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  display: flex;
}
body#layout #menu-top {
  width: 50%;
}
body#layout #social-media {
  width: 50%;
}
body#layout .header-logo {
  width: 100%;
  display: flex;
  overflow: hidden;
}
body#layout #logo {
  width: 50%;
}
body#layout #ads-header {
  width: 50%;
}

div.expr:style: "background-image: url(\"" + data:sourceUrl + "\"); " + "background-position: " + data:backgroundPositionStyleStr + "; " + data:widthStyleStr + "min-height: " + data:height + "_height: " + data:height + "background-repeat: no-repeat; "

b:widget-settings.b:widget-setting: Every month there are new freebies ready for you to enjoy on Allito App Market
